meaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> of the <radical>elephant</radical>s is so great, they put up an <kanji>image</kanji> or <kanji>statue</kanji> of him everywhere. Every house, every street corner — his image looks down on all the other elephants at all times.
readingMnemonic: When they unveil the <kanji>image</kanji>s and <kanji>statue</kanji>s of the leader elephant, everyone gasps. They look like him, but he's a <reading>zo</reading>mbie (ぞう). Gasp!
